user.title: Ship24 Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Ship24 API key and optionally a webhook ID.

For webhooks (optional):
- Leave webhook ID empty to auto-generate one
- Or enter a custom webhook ID (e.g., ship24_abc123)

After setup, configure the webhook URL in your Ship24 dashboard using the generated webhook ID.

error.invalid_webhook_id: Webhook ID must contain only letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens, and dots
